document_data.name: Madalitso
document_data.mainbody:
'''Madalitso''' was a [[human]] patron of the [[Blushing Mermaid]] in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|What were those monsters? If there is so much as a scratch on you I am going to ruin Grisly!|Madalitso}}
document_data.Description: Madalitso, just like his daughter, [[Nafula]], had a dark bronze skin color. He had short curly black hair and dark brown eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the time [[Captain Grisly]] was replaced by the [[green hag]] [[Auntie Ethel]] as the owner of the Blushing Mermaid, Madalitso and Nafula could often be found in the tavern's second-floor taproom. At that time, Madalitso was trying to convince Nafula to marry someone for the family's financial well-being, yet Nafula was opposed to an arranged marriage without love. However, for the family's sake and with some convincing, she was open to at least meeting the suitor before turning him down completely.
